short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THE BRAND NEW ONLINE STORE FOR YOUR BEST FRIEND.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pets & Meds Depot is a brand new online pet store. We sell animal care products for companion animals, horses, and farm animals.

We are a one stop shop for all things animals. From us, you can get your dog’s favourite food, your cat’s monthly flea treatment, and even treats for your backyard chickens! We stock the big brands that you all know and love – from Frontline to Arden Grange, from Kong to Feliway - as well as new and exciting finds that you simply won’t find everywhere else.

At Pets & Meds Depot, one of our qualified SQPs is always on hand to advise you about the most suitable treatment for your pet, ensuring that you can confidently treat your pet and maintain their health. We’re also committed to helping you navigate the myriad of pet foods to ensure that your pet is getting the right nutrition for their lifestyle. In short, everything we do at Pets & Meds Depot is undertaken with you and your pet’s needs in mind. 

So whether you own a guinea pig or an iguana, a pot-bellied pig or a parrot, we’re on hand to help you care for your best friend!
